title: ValidatePartnershipRequest
description: Request body for validating a partnership with optional customized package details

nb_tickets.description: Number of tickets allocated. Must be >= 0. Defaults to sponsoring pack value if omitted.

nb_job_offers.description: Number of job offers allowed. Must be >= 0. Required field.

booth_size.description: Size of booth (e.g., '3x3m'). Must match a value in event's packs. Defaults to pack value if omitted.
